attributes.name: poolFullPolicy
attributes.description: File system behavior to follow when pool is full and a write to this filesystem is attempted.

attributes.name: isReadOnly
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the file system is a destination for a replication session. Values are:
  • True - File system is read-only.
  • False - File system is read-write.

attributes.name: cifsShare
attributes.description: The cifsShares associated with the current filesystem

attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the file system instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the file system instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the file system, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Operational statuses of the file system.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: File system name.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: File system description.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: File system type.

attributes.name: creationTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the file system was created.

attributes.name: modificationTime
attributes.description: Date and time when the file system was last modified.

attributes.name: sizeTotal
attributes.description: File system size that the system presents to the host or end user.

attributes.name: sizeUsed
attributes.description: Quantity of used space in the file system. This measurement does not include space reserved for snapshots.

attributes.name: sizeAllocated
attributes.description:
Quantity of space reserved for the file system:
  • For a thin-provisioned file system, this can be less than the value of the sizeTotal attribute. and greater than or equal to the value of the sizeUsed attribute.
  • For a thick-provisioned file system, this is equal to the value of the sizeUsed attribute,
This measurement does not include space reserved for snapshots.

attributes.name: hostIOSize
attributes.description: Typical write I/O size from the host to the file system.

attributes.name: isThinEnabled
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the file system is thin-provisioned. Values are:
  • true - File system is thin-provisioned
  • false - File system is thick-provisoned.
Once thin provisioning is enabled on a file system, you cannot disable it.

attributes.name: storageResource
attributes.description: Storage resource to which the file system belongs, as defined by the storageResource resource type.

attributes.name: isCIFSSyncWritesEnabled
attributes.description:
(CIFS file systems) Indicates whether the synchronous writes option is enabled on the file system. Values are:
  • Synchronous writes option is enabled on the file system.
  • Synchronous writes option is disabled on the file system.

attributes.name: pool
attributes.description: Storage pool in which file system is provisioned, as defined by the pool resource type.

attributes.name: isCIFSOpLocksEnabled
attributes.description:
(CIFS file systems) Indicates whether opportunistic file locking is enabled on the file system. Values are:
  • Opportunistic file locking is enabled on the file system.
  • Opportunistic file locking is disabled on the file system.

attributes.name: nasServer
attributes.description: NAS server that provides network connectivity to the file system from the hosts.

attributes.name: isCIFSNotifyOnWriteEnabled
attributes.description:
(CIFS file systems) Indicates whether notifications on file writes are enabled on the file system. Values are:
  • Notifications on file writes are enabled on the file system.
  • Notifications on file writes are disabled on the file system.

attributes.name: isCIFSNotifyOnAccessEnabled
attributes.description:
(CIFS file systems) Indicates whether notifications on file access are enabled on the file system. Values are:
  • Notifications on file access are enabled on the file system.
  • Notifications on file access are disabled on the file system.

attributes.name: cifsNotifyOnChangeDirDepth
attributes.description: (CIFS file systems) Lowest directory level to which the enabled notifications apply, if any.

attributes.name: cifsNumUsedFiles
attributes.description: Needed for Microsoft SCVMM, for the delete CIFS share use case.

attributes.name: tieringPolicy
attributes.description: (Applies if a FAST VP license is installed.) FAST VP tiering policy for the file system.

attributes.name: tieringPolicy
attributes.description: (Applies if a FAST VP license is installed.) FAST VP tiering policy for the file system.

attributes.name: supportedProtocols
attributes.description: Protocols supported by the file system.

attributes.name: oid
attributes.description: Unique object ID of SYSAPI::FileSystem object.

attributes.name: backendId
attributes.description: Unique backend file system ID of SYSAPI::FileSystem object.

attributes.name: metadataSize
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space used by the file system metadata.

attributes.name: metadataSizeAllocated
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space reserved for file system metadata.

attributes.name: perTierSizeUsed
attributes.description: The amount of pool storage that has been consumed by the storage volume within specified tier. Tier size for the storage pool used by the file system.

attributes.name: snapsSize
attributes.description: Quantity of file system space used by file system snapshots.

attributes.name: snapsSizeAllocated
attributes.description: Quantity of file system space reserved for file system snapshots.

attributes.name: snapCount
attributes.description: Number of available file system snapshots.

attributes.name: isSMBCA
attributes.description:
Indicates whether or not SMB 3.0 is enabled. Values are:
  • true - SMB 3.0 is enabled.
  • false - SMB 3.0 is disabled.

attributes.name: accessPolicy
attributes.description: Access policies which are supported by file system.

attributes.name: renamePolicy
attributes.description: Rename policies which are supported by file system.

attributes.name: lockingPolicy
attributes.description: Locking policies which are supported by file system.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: File system format.

attributes.name: nfsShare
attributes.description: The nfsShares associated with the current filesystem
